scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(auto): updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(auto): updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(auto): updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

name: browser-monads-ts
description: Provide interfaces for the `window` and `document` variables of a webpage.
author: Daniel Esteves
